title: Miley Cyrus and Cody Simpson wear Joker filters and cuddle in bed
text:
Her estranged husband Liam Hemsworth has made it clear he's moved on, sharing passionate kisses with his new actress love.

And not to be outdone, Miley Cyrus is just as intense with her new lover Cody Simpson, sharing intimate selfies of the two as they lounge around in bed in their underwear.

Taking to Instagram stories, the scantily clad singer shared a short video of her and 22-year-old Australian singer Cody, wearing filters in homage to The Joker as they kiss.

Moving swiftly on: Miley Cyrus and Cody Simpson amp up the PDA as new lovers cuddle in their underwear while wearing Joker filters in bed on Instagram

Friends turned lovers: Miley wears just a bra in the images, while Cody is shirtless, revealing his muscular tattooed torso

Miley wears just a bra in the images, while Cody is shirtless, revealing his muscular tattooed torso.

Later in the day she shared images of them eating - sharing a kiss midway through their starters.

'Soup is an aphrodisiac,' wrote Miley.

'Soup is an aphrodisiac': Later in the day she shared images of them eating - sharing a kiss midway through their starters

Selfie tastic: Miley also shared pictures beside Cody in a bathroom

The two are old friends turned lovers and only just went public with their romance, but Cody has already announced a plan to release a song he wrote for Miley.

The former child star revealed that Miley is 'forcing him' to release the track he wrote for her last week while she was recovering in hospital with tonsillitis.

'I wrote her a song that she's pretty much forcing me to put out,' he told People on Sunday.

'She was like, "If you don't put this s**t out, I'm putting it out on your behalf for you. I'm getting your Spotify login and doing this s**t myself,"' he added.

Cody, who is releasing his new music next week, decided to write a song about Miley to cheer her up after she underwent surgery.

Fresh romance: Cody has written a song in homage to his new love

Can't Be Tamed singer Miley, 26, shared a short video to Instagram last week of Cody singing the track while playing an acoustic guitar.

'This sweet guy came to visit at the hospital and sang the sweetest song he wrote just for me,' she told her followers at the time.

The lyrics allude to a mystery woman, presumably Miley, having 'a golden thing'.

On Friday, Cody revealed that he was 'very, very happy' with his pop star girlfriend.

'She's very passionate about what she does, and I'm very similar in that sense. That's why we get along so well,' he said.

'I wrote her a song': Cody is releasing a single inspired by Miley next week

How sweet! Cody, who is releasing his new music next week, decided to write a song about Miley to cheer her up after she underwent tonsillitis surgery

Packing on the PDA; Liam Hemsworth pictured with new flame Maddison Brown this past week

Cody and Miley began dating after her split with reality star Kaitlynn Carter, who is the ex-partner of Brody Jenner.

Before her fling with Kaitlynn, Miley was in a long-term relationship Liam Hemsworth, whom she married in December 2018.

Their relationship then went downhill and the pair announced their separation this summer.

Liam has since been pictured with Australian actress Maddison Brown, with the two caught in a passionate clinch last week.

Brief relationship: Cody and Miley began dating after her split with reality star Kaitlynn Carter (right), who is the ex-partner of Brody Jenner
description: Pair's loved up Instagram session comes after Miley's estranged husband Liam Hemsworth passionately kissed new love Maddison Brown on romantic date.
